name: North Water Vinyl-Tec 2000 Adhesive
description: An industrial-strength adhesive that creates a strong chemical bond. Use it to attach vinyl-patched D-rings or anchors to Kevlar®, fibreglass, Royalex®, R-light (1996 and newer) boats. You can also use it to repair vinyl float bags.100 ml.Note: important to follow directions for a good bond.
